scripts.deploy: AWS_PROFILE=boundless-development AWS_REGION=us-west-1 pnpm exec cdk deploy SampleInfrastructureStack --outputs-file cdk-outputs.json --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:live: AWS_PROFILE=boundless-development AWS_REGION=us-west-1 pnpm exec cdk deploy SampleInfrastructureStack -c liveLambdaActive=true --outputs-file cdk-outputs.json --require-approval never
